superDomainName.x-prompt: Input the name of the superDomain to which a util lib should be added. E.g. 'neurology'. Do not prepend with '/libs/'.

domainName.x-prompt: Input the name of domain to which a feature lib should be added. E.g. 'medicine'. Do not prepend with '/libs/' or superdomain name.

featureName.x-prompt: Input the name of the feature, e.g. 'overview'. Do not prepend with 'feature-' or anything else.
